pages.text: The Watching Warglaive is a powerful and deadly weapon that is made to be wielded by skilled and fierce warriors. Boasting two blinking eyes on the center, the blades are made of a dark, almost black metal that seems to absorb the light around it

The Watching Warglaive has the power to siphon health from nearby enemies and transfer it to its wielder, keeping them in the fight longer. The Warglaive also has a chance to immediately execute its opponents, dealing a powerful and critical blow that can end the fight instantly.
